non_residential_details.development_type: Change of Use with Extension(s) over 999sqm

description: Demolition of 15 Minories and 62 Aldgate High Street and redevelopment to provide a Class B1 office building with Class A1 retail (18,537sq.m).  Extension and recladding of 16 Minories and change of use from offices (Class B1) to a hotel (Class C1), Class A3 restaurant and Class D1 (health)/ Class D2 (community) use (17,367sq.m.). Erection of new residential building (Class C3) providing 87 units (7829sq.m.). Relandscaping of open space and public realm improvements.
site_name:
15 - 16 Minories & 62 Aldgate High Street
London
EC3N 1AX
